# Snitch Support

After the Snitch completes all tasks, they will see the Impostors names as Red in the Meeting.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Snitches that can be in a match
  • See Arrow Towards Target
    • ON: the Snitch will see a small arrow that points towards the killer(s)
      • See Colored Arrows based on Team Colors
        • ON: the Snitch will see Red Arrows for Impostors, and Gray for Neutrals
        • OFF: the Snitch will see Same-Colored Arrows for Impostors and Neutrals
    • OFF: the Snitch will not know of the killer's location
  • Can find Neutral Killers
    • ON: the Snitch can complete tasks and find out who's a Neutral Killer too
    • OFF: the Snitch will only find Impostors
  • Can find Madmates
    • ON: the Snitch can complete tasks and find out who's a Madmate too
    • OFF: the Snitch will only find regular Impostors
  • Remaining tasks to be known (arrow appears pointing to the snitch if they have this amount of tasks)
    • Set the amount of Tasks left for a Snitch to reveal that they exist to the Impostors and Neutrals
  • Override Snitchs Tasks
    • ON: you can set a different amount of Tasks that a Snitch needs to do
      • Snitch has Common Tasks
        • Set if the Snitch has Common Tasks
      • Amount of Long Tasks for Snitch
        • Set the amount of Long Tasks the Snitch will receive
      • Amount of Short Tasks for Snitch
        • Set the amount of Short Tasks the Snitch will receive
    • OFF: the Snitch does the same amount of Tasks as anyone else

From: TOH
